text: Maarten de Boer / Getty Images Entertainment UPDATED : Brendan Fraser Says the HFPA Denied His Claims of Sexual Harassment In a GQ profile from earlier this year, Brendan Fraser claimed that former HFPA president Philip Berk groped him in 2003. The organization quietly launched an internal investigation and, according to Fraser, tried to explain that Berk ’ s actions were intended as “ a joke. ” But Fraser ’ s not laughing. Recently, I spent some time with the actor Brendan Fraser for a feature in this magazine. In one of our last conversations, he shared a startling story with me.
